attributes.action: Defer Article 50 invocation whilst Election expenses fraud is unresolved
attributes.background: In light of the recent £70,000 fine handed down by the Electoral Commission, and the possibility of the Conservative majority being eliminated through results being voided, the basis of any claimed mandate to invoke Article 50 is highly dubious so any decision to invoke Article 50 needs deferring.

rejection.details:
The Prime Minister has already written to European Council President Donald Tusk to notify him of the UK’s intention to leave the EU, so it is not possible for the Government to take this action.

You can read the full text of the letter here:

https://www.planforbritain.gov.uk/news/prime-ministers-letter-donald-tusk-triggering-article-50/?_ga=1.26312509.1235604037.1436001364
